Instruction has been given me that the light should now come in clear lines to those associated with you, lest they be led astray. It was presented before me that when you did things which your associates knew were not right, they did not act as faithful shepherds, to tell you your mistake, because you would not 
                                                                           48
acknowledge that your course of action was wrong, and would not receive anything that did not harmonize with your ideas.
